alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 5:01PM CST until February 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...through Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 122.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM CST Sunday was 122.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 123.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
